name: The Lighthouse (itch) (joedoesdev)
description:
After returning to her family's lighthouse, our main character uncovers memories of her past that shape her emotions and start to have a considerable impact on the island she once called home.

This game presents itself as a simple 3D platformer with story based elements.
Made for the DeepWell 2022 Game Jam in 3 weeks by me, Joe!
